bioAsHtml: Renato Cavalcanti is an independent Scala developer based in Belgium. Coming from a totally different field (psychology), he discovered a passion for programming in 1999. Scala aficionado since 2009, he has been hacking in Scala and related technologies for fun and profit. He's the founder of BeScala and co-founder of Strong[Typed]​ .

acceptedTalks.title: Field guide to DDD/CQRS using the Scala Type System and Akka
